methods: abstract <T extends Annotation> T getAnnotation(Class<T> annotationType) Returns, for this element, the annotation with the specified type, or null if no annotation with the specified type is present (including inherited annotations).
abstract Annotation[] getAnnotations() Returns, for this element, an array containing all annotations (including inherited annotations).
abstract Annotation[] getDeclaredAnnotations() Returns, for this element, all annotations that are explicitly declared (not inherited).

abstract boolean isAnnotationPresent(Class<? extends Annotation> annotationType) Indicates whether or not this element has an annotation with the specified annotation type (including inherited annotations).
